Classes¶

MailingList¶

class pyholster.MailingList(**kwargs)[source]¶

Represent a MailingList in Mailgun. This class manages the alias (address), name, description and access level, as well as the members.

add_member(member)[source]¶

Add a member to the MailingList.

add_members(members)[source]¶

Add multiple members to the MailingList.

delete_all_members()[source]¶

Try to delete all members. Return False if one or more delete attempts raised an error.

get_member_by_address(address)[source]¶

Get a member based on his address.

get_member_by_var(var, value)[source]¶

Return the first member that is encountered in the list of members filtered by the passed variable (singular).

get_member_by_vars(**vars_)[source]¶

Return the first member that is encountered in the list of members filtered by the passed variables (plural).

get_members_by_var(var, value)[source]¶

Return a generator generating a filtered list of members based on the passed variable (singular).

get_members_by_vars(**vars_)[source]¶

Return a generator generating a filtered list of members based on the passed variables (plural).

implement()[source]¶

Implement a MailingList for the first time on Mailgun. Not for updating.

is_implemented()[source]¶

Check whether a MailingList with this address is implemented by trying to load it from Mailgun.

classmethod load(address)[source]¶

Load a single MailingList by address.

classmethod load_all()[source]¶

Load all MailingLists.

load_members()[source]¶

Load all members of the MailingList.

save_members()[source]¶

Insert/safe all set members individually.

update(safe=True, **kwargs)[source]¶

Update the given attributes (by key=value). Update the MailingList at Mailgun if safe is True.

Member¶

class pyholster.Member(**kwargs)[source]¶

Describes a MailingList member

delete()[source]¶

Delete the Member from Mailgun and, if it succeeds, from the MailingList it belongs to.

implement()[source]¶

Implements a member for the first time on Mailgun. Don’t use for updates.

is_implemented()[source]¶

Checks whether a Member with this address is implemented by trying to load it from Mailgun.

update(**kwargs)[source]¶

Update the given attributes (by key=value) and send to Mailgun.

Route¶

class pyholster.Route(**kwargs)[source]¶

Mail¶

class pyholster.Mail(**kwargs)[source]¶

Handles the sending of a Mail trough Mailgun.

check_attributes()[source]¶

Check whether the attributes are the right format.

get_data()[source]¶

Create a data structure.

get_files()[source]¶

Create a file structure.

send()[source]¶

Send the Mail to Mailgun.
